articles.content: The beauty queen rode an autorickshaw to her alma mater on Tuesday, her father in the drivers seat and her mother holding her hand sitting at the back, a family that dared to dream big and gave it th… [+4059 chars]

articles.title: Karisma And Ibrahim Check In On Mom-To-Be Kareena Kapoor NDTV - NDTV
articles.description: On Wednesday, Karisma Kapoor dropped by to visit sister Kareena Kapoor at her Bandra residence, who is in her final days of pregnancy.

articles.description: Bigg Boss 14 finale: Rubina Dilaik, Rahul Vaidya, Aly Goni, Rakhi Sawant and Nikki Tamboli are the finalists of Bigg Boss 14. Cast your votes and tell us who stands to emerge as the winner.

articles.author: Pinkvilla Desk
articles.title: 'Kangana Ranaut you are a nuclear bomb', Ram Gopal Varma praises her in now deleted tweet about Dhaakad star - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Kangana Ranaut recently shared a selfie from the action shoot of Dhaakad with traces of blood on her face. Filmmaker Ram Gopal Varma took to Twitter to laud the actress for her professionalism. However, he deleted the tweet later.

articles.author: Pinkvilla Desk
articles.title: R Madhavan receives degree of Doctor of Letters for contribution to Arts and Cinema: ‘I am truly humbled’ - PINKVILLA
articles.description: R Madhavan receives honour for his contribution to arts in cinema. The actor expressed his gratitude upon receiving the degree.

articles.title: Roohi trailer: Janhvi Kapoor turns bride-stealer ghost for Rajkummar Rao in follow up to Stree - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rajkummar Rao and Janhvi Kapoor-starrer Roohi is the second installment in the Stree franchise. It revolves around a singing ghost who puts grooms to sleep so it can possess their brides.
articles.content: The makers of Stree are back with the second installment in the horror-comedy franchise, Roohi. The trailer looks as impressive as the original as it teases the story of a ghost who possesses brides … [+2008 chars]
